articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about this project
articles.contents:
Hi My Name is Arghayan. I will be studying biomedical science at the Univerisity of Ottawa Next year. This site was created as my final project of David Kaneâ€™s Data Science Bootcamp
The Source for the information presented on this site is collected from the RIOT games developer API which can be found at https://developer.riotgames.com/

articles.title: The Relationship Between Game Duration and Gold difference in Pro League of Legends
articles.description: Welcome to the website. I hope you enjoy it!
